verbose_text: The lifespan extension effect caused by the expression of either wild-type Daw or Myo in adult fly muscle once again, appears to be independent of genetic background, since we observed no lifespan extension effect for either of the two genes when TubGal80 ts, Mhc-Gal4 / UAS-Daw or TubGal80 ts, Mhc-Gal4 / UAS-Myo flies were raised at 18degreesC, a condition under which Daw or Myo are not expressed (P> 0.05).
